group_1.textLeft: Thanks for your hard work, Charu.

group_1.textRight: Yes, thank you.
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]That was my first time staying up all niiight...

group_1.textLeft: It was the same for us, actually.

group_1.textRight: Were you dealing with stuff the entire time?

group_1.textLeft: On account of Mikoshiba's passing, yes...
There was even more of an uproar after the dancers died, too...

group_1.textRight: So that's why everyone was talking all night...

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps only people linked to the Diviners knew the truth...
They said that Mikoshiba legally adopted each @dancer so that they could succeed her, after all.
So, how were things on your end, Charu?

group_1.textRight: Right! We couldn't dig into every detail, but we can @give a pretty good explanation.

group_1.textLeft: I really read most of it myself, though.

group_1.textRight: Urgh... I swear I'm gonna studyyy...

group_1.textLeft: But why have we come here?

group_1.textRight: We figured it was a good place to start, since the Tokime clan's roots are at this shrine.
...Well, not really. It's because the Wavering Deity is nearby.

group_1.textLeft: Why the Wavering Deity?

group_1.textRight: You'll understand in a minute.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, would you mind starting for us?
This cliffhanger is stressing me out.

group_1.textRight: Right. The story was divided into two major chapters.
One is about the Mikoshibas, and the other is about @the Tokimes.

group_1.narration: Let's start with the Mikoshiba clan's story. @They used to be warriors sent to protect the Tokimes, @and it seems they seized control over the village @right around an era when there were no @Diviners present.
From there, the Mikoshibas changed the @rules in various ways, creating rituals @like the Kagura of the Nation's Guard, @the Diviner's Ceremony, @the coming-of-age ceremony...
And gained the power to manipulate Devils @thanks to a wish @they had one of the village's girls grant.
Then they hid the village inside that Labyrinth.@In short, the Mikoshibas used the Labyrinth to hide @a village that would create Diviners @to make money for them,
and in order to maintain control over it, @they killed the Diviners @to prevent information from leaking to the outside.

group_1.textLeft: So what Mikoshiba did to me...

group_1.textRight: Seems to have been tradition for a long time...

group_1.textLeft: Then, the part about us becoming Devils...

group_1.textRight: Looks like that's true too...

group_1.textLeft: No...
...Well, what's next?!

group_1.textRight: Right.

group_1.narration: The next part described @the Wavering Deity.
It's a Devil formed from all the discarded Diviners. @It just drifts around in circles, @neither able to leave @nor to return to its hidden village.
According to the book, the Wavering Deity @would return to the village once the Mikoshibas @and the Devil's Labyrinth are gone,
and after swallowing up the village, @it would ultimately erase @all evidence of Diviners existing.

group_1.textRight: It seemed like an obsession, even. @It'll never surrender the Tokimes to anyone else...

group_1.textLeft: Wait...
Then since the Labyrinth covering the village is @already gone...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, the Wavering Deity must be on its way back...
When it arrives, we've got to defeat it.

group_1.textLeft: So right as our ancestors come back, @we'll be opening fire on them...

group_1.textRight: No we won't...
We're going to free the Tokime Diviners who've been suffering all this time...!
Because we've smashed all of Mikoshiba's rules...!

group_1.textLeft: Those ancestors will have been growing over @so many years, though...
Can the three of us really defeat them...?
I know we've got no other choice, of course.
Woah!

group_1.textRight: This presence... It's the Wavering Deity...

group_1.textLeft: Now I understand why we set up camp all the way @out here.
We're going to intercept it here, right?

group_1.textRight: I know this is awful timing, but can you all come @back to my house...?

group_1.textLeft: Mother?!

group_1.textRight: I'll tell you about the sword I talked about last night@ on the way.
Whew. This is getting my pulse far higher than it @should be at my age!
